article.description: Mike Gansey didn't want his season to end in his hometown.

related.description: The legacy of several of this year's top seeds will be tainted by early NCAA failure.
related.title: Wake, Kansas and others judged on final impression
related.headline: Wake, Kansas and others judged on final impression

article.headline: No. 2 seed Wake, plagued by foul trouble, makes early exit
article.linkText: West Virginia stuns Wake Forest in double overtime
article.story: WINSTON-SALEM, N.C. (AP) -- Justin Gray scored all of his 18 points in the first half to help Wake Forest beat Mars Hill 96-63 on Saturday night in the Demon Deacons' second and final exhibition game. Eric Williams added 15 points, Kyle Visser had 13, and Cameron Stanley and Harvey Hale added 12 each for Wake Forest, which led 56-30 at halftime. Walt Baxley led Mars Hill with 22 points, including 10-of-10 from the free throw line. Wake Forest will open the regular season Thursday night against Mississippi Valley State.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
